column4: BRIEF-A. O. Smith Corp Resumes All Operations In China At Below Normal Levels
column6: * A. O. SMITH CORP - HAVE RESUMED ALL OPERATIONS IN CHINA BUT AT BELOW NORMAL LEVELS
column7: * A. O. SMITH CORP - MAJORITY OF STORES IN CHINA WHERE CO’S PRODUCTS ARE SOLD HAVE TEMPORARILY CLOSED
column8: * A. O. SMITH CORP - MOST OF STORES THAT REMAIN OPEN IN CHINA ARE OPERATING WITH REDUCED HOURS & EXPERIENCING SIGNIFICANT DECLINES IN CUSTOMER TRAFFIC
column9: * A. O. SMITH CORP - DURATION AND INTENSITY OF IMPACT OF CORONAVIRUS AND RESULTING DISRUPTION TO OPERATIONS IS UNCERTAIN
column10: * A. O. SMITH CORP - NOW EXPECT CORONAVIRUS SITUATION WILL HAVE A MATERIAL ADVERSE IMPACT TO OPERATING RESULTS IN Q1 OF 2020 Source: (bit.ly/3c44M9P) Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-A. O. Smith Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.57
column6: * EXPECTS SALES OF ABOUT $15 MILLION AND A SMALL LOSS DUE TO START-UP AND TRANSITION COSTS FROM NEW BUSINESS IN 2018
column7: * TRANSITION TO A. O. SMITH BRAND AT LOWE’S WILL TAKE PLACE BEGINNING IN AUGUST
column8: * SEES SALES GROWTH FOR 2018 BETWEEN 10 AND 10.75 PERCENT Source text: (bit.ly/2Kfac4c) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

column4: BRIEF-A. O. Smith to become primary water treatment brand at Lowe's
column6: * HAS BEEN SELECTED AS PRIMARY SUPPLIER OF RESIDENTIAL WATER TREATMENT PRODUCTS FOR ALL LOWE’S U.S. HOME IMPROVEMENT STORES
column7: * EXPECTS NEW BUSINESS’ IMPACT TO EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE MINIMAL IN 2018, DUE TO START-UP COSTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
